meanings.definition: To attend an event or function together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I coattended the concert last night.
meanings.sent2: They coattended the party and had a great time together.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coattended the family reunion and caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The two detectives coattended the stakeout, waiting for the suspect to appear.
meanings.sent5: The students coattended the lecture, taking notes and asking questions.

meanings.definition: Attended by two or more people at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The coattended meeting was productive with multiple perspectives shared.
meanings.sent2: The coattended workshop had a lively atmosphere with everyone participating.
meanings.sent3: The coattended movie night turned into a cozy gathering with friends.
meanings.sent4: The coattended class trip was filled with laughter and shared experiences.
meanings.sent5: The coattended event brought together people from different backgrounds.
